name: Double Astro: Connected Minds
description:
The year is 2132. World technology evolved so fast, but there are on technology still on testing for a long time, its mind connecting. Person who use this chip-shaped technology planted on their brain with one other person. It will make any movement, mind, and other will fully sincronized. And there are 2 ninjas who try that tech.

This is the future. People already make mars as a liveable planet. One day there are 2 ninjas who want to take a vacation to mars. Will they're do their vacation without problem ? You will find out at Double Astro: Connected Minds

This games was originally make for GMTK Game Jam 2021 with Joined Together theme, but will updated and added more feature and also new chapter, just stay tuned for more updates !

*This game inspired by Trap Adventure

**This game will released for androud and web based games too, so stay tuned !

If you have any suggestion or bugs, feel free to contact me at electronicestudios@gmail.com , i will reply as soon as possible !

Minimum System requirements :

Intel core 2 duo 2.00 GHz

2GB RAM

500MB Free disk space

640 x 360 Display Resolution
